con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://research.sun.com/wadl/2006/10" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org" xmlns:tns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <xs:element name="criterion-requirement" type="tns:criterionRequirementDTO"/> <xs:element name="direct-criterion-requirement" type="tns:directCriterionRequirementDTO"/> <xs:element name="indirect-criterion-requirement" type="tns:indirectCriterionRequirementDTO"/> <xs:element name="instance-constraint-violations-list" type="tns:instanceConstraintViolationsListDTO"/> <xs:element name="internal-error" type="tns:internalErrorDTO"/> <xs:element name="label" type="tns:labelReferenceDTO"/> <xs:element name="order" type="tns:orderDTO"/> <xs:element name="order-line" type="tns:orderLineDTO"/> <xs:element name="order-line-group" type="tns:orderLineGroupDTO"/> <xs:element name="order-list" type="tns:orderListDTO"/> <xs:complexType name="instanceConstraintViolationsListDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="instance-constraint-violations" type="tns:instanceConstraintViolationsDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="instanceConstraintViolationsDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="constraint-violation" type="tns:constraintViolationDTO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="recoverable-error" type="tns:recoverableErrorDTO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="tns:internal-error"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="instance-id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="num-item" type="xs:long"/> <xs:attribute name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="entity-type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="constraintViolationDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="field-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="recoverableErrorDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="property" type="tns:propertyDTO"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="error-code" type="xs:int" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="propertyDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="internalErrorDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="stack-trace" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderListDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:order"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:orderLineGroupDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="dependencies-constraints-have-priority" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:attribute name="calendar-name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderLineGroupDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:orderElementDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="children"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xs:element ref="tns:order-line"/> <xs:element ref="tns:order-line-group"/> <xs:element ref="tns:order"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderElementDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="labels"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:label"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="material-assignments"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="material-assignment" type="tns:materialAssignmentDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="advance-measurements"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="advance-measurement" type="tns:advanceMeasurementDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="criterion-requirements"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xs:element ref="tns:direct-criterion-requirement"/> <xs:element ref="tns:indirect-criterion-requirement"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="init-date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="deadline" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="description" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="code" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderLineDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:orderElementDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hours-groups"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="hours-group" type="tns:hoursGroupDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="hoursGroupDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="criterion-requirements"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xs:element ref="tns:direct-criterion-requirement"/> <xs:element ref="tns:indirect-criterion-requirement"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="resource-type" type="tns:resourceEnumDTO"/> <xs:attribute name="working-hours" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="directCriterionRequirementDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:criterionRequirementDTO"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="criterionRequirementDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="indirectCriterionRequirementDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:criterionRequirementDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="valid" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="labelReferenceDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="code" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="materialAssignmentDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="material-code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="units" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:attribute name="unit-price" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:attribute name="estimated-availability" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="advanceMeasurementDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:decimal"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="resourceEnumDTO"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="RESOURCE"/> <xs:enumeration value="WORKER"/> <xs:enumeration value="MACHINE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </grammars> <resources base="http://localhost:8180/libreplan/ws/rest/"> <resource path="/orderelements/"> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </response> </method> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/{code}/"> <param name="code" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="DELETE"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/{code}/"> <param name="code" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>
